On 2012/08/10 06:19:59, remyoudompheng wrote:
> ... I am not sure
> about bug206.out on Windows, maybe CL 5847068 is necessary for it?

I think you will be OK on windows, because we output to console as is. I think CL 5847068 is different because their program calls into C console output function. Perhaps, these do line end character fiddling.

Alex
